subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The 2011-12 N.B.A. season schedule was finally unveiled, with 66 games crammed into a shortened season. Some teams will play on three consecutive nights, others will play five games in six nights.
snippet: The 2011-12 N.B.A. season schedule was finally unveiled, with 66 games crammed into a shortened season. Some teams will play on three consecutive nights, others will play five games in six nights.
